alert.note: Alert for Garland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Garland County through 800 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Mountain Pine, or 11 miles west of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Mountain Pine... Rockwell... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Hot Springs National Park... Royal... Sunshine... Hempwallace... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
